title: 迷你方块怎么安装
txt_content: RT我用尽方法都装不了怎么装啊

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
Install ModLoader
Install the mod
Place the .zip in your mods folder (that is in .minecraft folder) OR simply drop all the files from the .zip into your minecraft.jar except the readme.txt (META-INF folder should already be deleted).

首先安裝 ModLoader , 並記得刪除 META-INF 文件夾
再把迷你方塊的.ZIP壓縮文件放到 .minecraft\mods 文件夾中, 沒有的話自己新增一個
(也可以把 .ZIP內的所有東西全丟進 minecraft.jar 裡)

well 发表于 2011-12-3 04:29 
Install ModLoader
Install the mod
Place the .zip in your mods folder (that is in .minecraft folder ...
没有用

replies.author: CIEben
replies.txt_content:
最简单的方法，
随便找个懒人包，要对应你的mod的版本。
找到懒人包后解压好后点击Minecraft文件夹里面的.minecraft，然后会看到一个mods。把下载后的mod解压到里面，再把这个mod里面的文件夹的东西添加到Minecraft.jar。这样就行了，详情QQ：417179397

replies.author: kolongchj
replies.txt_content: 我的装好能用，就是看不到里面方块
